Sentencas: The oxygen reduction reaction is an important reaction at the cathode in solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Mayenite Electrides and Their Doped Forms for Oxygen Reduction Reaction in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Materials that exhibit high chemical and mechanical stability, high ionic and electronic conductivity, and are non-toxic are of great interest as cathodes for the reduction of oxygen.
Titulo: Mayenite Electrides and Their Doped Forms for Oxygen Reduction Reaction in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Here, we use density functional theory simulations to examine the efficacy of 12CaO center dot 7Al(2)O(3) and 12SrO center dot 7Al(2)O(3) electrides and their doped forms for the conversion of O-2 gas to form O2- in their nanocages via encapsulation.
Titulo: Mayenite Electrides and Their Doped Forms for Oxygen Reduction Reaction in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Calculations show that encapsulation is exoergic in the un-doped electrides, and the formation of O2- is confirmed by the charge analysis.
Titulo: Mayenite Electrides and Their Doped Forms for Oxygen Reduction Reaction in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: A stronger encapsulation is noted for C12A7 electride than the S12A7 electride.
Titulo: Mayenite Electrides and Their Doped Forms for Oxygen Reduction Reaction in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The C12A7 electride doped with B or Ga also exhibits exoergic encapsulation, but its encapsulation energy is slightly lower than that calculated for the un-doped C12A7 electride.
Titulo: Mayenite Electrides and Their Doped Forms for Oxygen Reduction Reaction in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: There is an enhancement in the encapsulation for the S12A7 electride doped with B compared to its un-doped form.
Titulo: Mayenite Electrides and Their Doped Forms for Oxygen Reduction Reaction in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Doping of Ga in S12A7 electride exhibits only a very small change in the encapsulation with respect to its un-doped form.
Titulo: Mayenite Electrides and Their Doped Forms for Oxygen Reduction Reaction in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The present results can be of interest in the design of cathode material for solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Mayenite Electrides and Their Doped Forms for Oxygen Reduction Reaction in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells
